original: Meurling, Carl Jair Agathan, kyrkoherde, Östra Ryd, f. 11/5/95 i Bollnäs av folkskoll. Carl M. o. Augusta Meurling. G. 29 m. Karin Johnson. Barn: Gunnar f. 30, Birgit 32, Göran 35. — Stud:ex. i Upps. 15, teol fil. ex. 17, teol. kand. o. prakt. teol. prov 20, prästv. f. Linköp. stift 21. V. pastor i Västra Husby 21-29, i Östra Ryd 21-28, kyrkoh. där sed. 28. Ordf. i skol-styr., barnav :nd, kyrkostämma samt Östra Ryds Sparbank, v. ordf. i komm:fullm. o. komm:stämma.
translated:
Meurling, Carl Jair Agathan, pastor, Östra Ryd, b. 11/5/95 in Bollnäs to commoners. Son of Carl M. and Augusta Meurling. Married on 29 with Karin Johnson. Children: Gunnar, b. 30, Birgit, b. 32, Göran, b. 35. 

Education: Student:ex. (graduate from high school) in Uppsala in 1915, theology bachelor's degree in 1917, theology licentiate and practical theology examination in 1920, ordained priest for the Linköping Diocese in 1921. 

Positions: Deputy pastor in Västra Husby from 1921 to 1929, in Östra Ryd from 1921 to 1928, and became the vicar there since 1928. Chairman of the school board, child welfare board, church assembly, and Östra Ryd Savings Bank. Vice Chairman of the municipal council and municipal assembly.
